Welcome! I am a PhD student in Economics at the **University of Michigan**. My interests lie in **International Trade, Macroeconomics, and Spatial**. Before starting my PhD, I helped build the [administrative tax database](https://www.treasury.gov.za/research/NT-SDF/default.aspx) at the National Treasury of South Africa, where I worked with the UN, World Bank, and Economic Research Southern Africa. I also spent a year at Yale University as part of the Tobin Centre Predoc program.
